resources.description:
The [Lasertime API](https://github.com/ntflix/Lasertime) is organized around [REST](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_State_Transfer).
The API accepts JSON, multipart, and XML request bodies, returns JSON response bodies, and uses standard [HTTP response codes](https://httpstatuses.com) and authentication.

The order of parameters in request bodies is not important.

## Authentication üîê
The Lasertime API supports [HTTP Basic authentication](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Authentication). This is because the amount of requests a user will be making is so small, that having JWT or sessions implemented simply wouldn't be worth the one request they would authenticate for.

You will use your Lasertime username and password for the username and password. Admins will use their email address and password for the username and password.
resources.name: Lasertime API

resources.description:
Get the authenticated user's details.

Returns a user object.
resources.name: Get user details

resources.description: Get the lasertime logs of the authenticated user. Returns an array of lasertime logs.
resources.name: Get user's lasertime logs

resources.description:
Creates a lasertime log record on the server under a user's name (id).

Sample request body to create a record:
```json
{
  "descript": "pizza. just pizza",
  "cutTime": "2020-05-27T17:21:00+00:00",
  "duration": 22
}
```

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | ---
| duration | `Int` | 42 | Duration in seconds
| cutTime | `ISO8601 DateTime` | 2020-04-27T17:21:00Z | Optional - will use current if not supplied
| paid | `ISO8601 DateTime` | 2020-05-29T12:12:00Z | Optional - date/time of payment
| descript | `String` | pizza. just pizza | Optional

Returns lasertime log object on success:

```http
200 OK
```
```json
{
  "duration": "99",
  "cutTime": "2020-05-29 12:39:21 +0000",
  "paid": "",
  "descript": "choppin up sausages",
  "userID": "AAF02299-97C4-4D87-B638-8F5BBAC57400"
}
```
resources.name: Add lasertime log

resources.description:
This endpoint does not require authentication for use.
Returns a list of material objects:

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | ---
| id | `UUID` | `22314E62-22F1-4EE2-9833-E2920E08DB49` | The UUID of the material
| name | `String` | Wood | Name of the material
| price | `Int` | 25 | Price of material in pence/m^2
resources.name: Materials

resources.description:
Create a material on the server. The name must be unique.

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | ---
| name | `String` | Wood | Required - name of the material
| price | `Int` | 25 | Required - price of material in (pence m^-2)
resources.name: Add Material

resources.description: Get all users' details. Returns an array of user objects.
resources.name: Get all users

resources.description:
Get user details by specifying username in URL.

Returns a user object.

### User object:

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| username | `String` | gary99 | | 
| userID | `String` | AAF02299-97C4-4D87-B638-8F5BBAC57400 | |
| firstName | `String` | Gary | |
| lastName | `String` | McGary | Optional
| email | `String` | gary@garyswebsite.gary | Optional
resources.name: Get user by username

resources.description:
### _This request is deprecated and not for use outside of testing._

Get all admins' details.

Returns an array of admin objects.

### Admin object:
Get user details by specifying username in URL.

### Returns a user object:
| Item name | Data type | Example
| --- | --- | ---
| userID | `String` | 11C2986C-708E-4E9F-BA81-D057E3800B77
| email | `String` | bruh@iron59.co.uk
resources.name: Get all admins

resources.description:
Get all lasertime logs for all users.

Returns an array of lasertime logs.

### Lasertime log:
| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | --- | 
| id | `String` | 3C03ABB4-3C05-4CCB-9457-A0EAEFBC2185 | |
| duration | `Int` | 42 | Duration in seconds
| cutTime | `ISO8601 DateTime` | 2020-04-27T17:21:00Z | |
| paid | `ISO8601 DateTime` | 2020-05-29T12:12:00Z | Optional
| descript | `String` | Cutting my hair | Optional
| userID | `String` | AAF02299-97C4-4D87-B638-8F5BBAC57400 | The userID for the user who did the cut
resources.name: Get all lasertime

resources.description: Get the lasertime logs of a specific user. Returns an array of lasertime logs.
resources.name: Get  specific user's lasertime

resources.description:
Create user from a user object.

Sample request body:

```json
{
	"username": "bob",
	"email": "bob@iron59.co.uk",
	"password": "Wf-\\anS,yx9vv3-s@",
	"firstName": "Bob",
	"lastName": "Bobson"
}
```

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| username | `String` | bob | Must be unique
| password | `String` | Wf-\\anS,yx9vv3-s@ | Must be at least 8 characters long
| firstName | `String` | Bob | |
| lastName | `String` | Bobson | Optional
| email | `String` | bob@iron59.co.uk | Optional

Returns username and user ID on success:
```http
200 OK
```
```json
{
  "id": "D5D37FC5-570C-484F-A5FC-EB074DF3ED81",
  "username": "bob"
}
```
resources.name: Create user

resources.description:
Create an admin on the server.

Sample request body:

```json
{
	"email":"awesomeAdmin@iron59.co.uk",
	"password":"GrQe5212uJK3/bj8g/FJ487"
}
```

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | ---
| email | `String` | awesomeAdmin@iron59.co.uk | Must be unique
| password | `String` | GrQe5212uJK3/bj8g/FJ487 | Must be at least 8 characters long

Returns email and user ID on success:

```http
200 OK
```
```json
{
  "id": "4F9E96B5-671E-4030-AE91-2A4026C800AB",
  "email": "awesomeAdmin@iron59.co.uk"
}
```
resources.name: Create admin

resources.description:
Creates a lasertime log record on the server under a user's name (id).

Sample request body to create a record:
```json
{
  "userID": "AAF02299-97C4-4D87-B638-8F5BBAC57400",
  "descript": "vaporising some cheese",
  "duration": 42
}
```

| Item name | Data type | Example | Notes
| --- | --- | --- | ---
| duration | `Int` | 42 | Duration in seconds
| cutTime | `ISO8601 DateTime` | 2020-04-27T17:21:00Z | Optional - will use current if not supplied
| paid | `ISO8601 DateTime` | 2020-05-29T12:12:00Z | Optional - date/time of payment
| descript | `String` | vaporising some cheese | Optional
| userID | `String` | AAF02299-97C4-4D87-B638-8F5BBAC57400 | The userID for the user who did the cut

Returns lasertime log object on success:

```http
200 OK
```
```json
{
  "duration": "42",
  "cutTime": "2020-05-29 12:39:21 +0000",
  "paid": "false",
  "descript": "vaporising some cheese",
  "userID": "AAF02299-97C4-4D87-B638-8F5BBAC57400"
}
```
resources.name: Add lasertime log for user
